body.p: HP Helion Openstack is provided with two baremetal installation options depending on your system configuration. It allows you to manage the KVM and ESX hypervisors and provision virtual ymachines.

section.title: KVM Hypervisor
section.p: You can use your KVM cloud with either HP Storevirtual or HP StoreServ (3PAR) storage:

section.title: HP StoreVirtual VSA storage
section.p: Cinder Block Storage Using HP StoreVirtual VSA HP StoreVirtual VSA Software is a Virtual Storage Appliance for the Linux KVM environment.

section.title: HP StoreServ (3PAR) storage
section.p: HP StoreServ (3PAR) Support HP 3PAR StoreServ is a storage array that supports Fibre Channel (FC) as well as iSCSI protocol.

section.title: Swift Scale-Out cluster
section.p: Scale-out Swift An optional Swift Scale-Out cluster instance of between two and twelve servers that is used for production cloud Object storage use.

section.title: ESX Hypervisor
section.p: Deploy vCenter ESX compute proxy HP Helion Openstack supports VMWare ESX hypervisor to provision and manage an overcloud ESX cluster.
